name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this adverse event by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this adverse event by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this adverse event by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of the data entry of the adverse event or potential adverse event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current state of the data entry of the adverse event or potential adverse event.

name: $actuality
desc: Returns: Whether the event actually happened, or just had the potential to. Note that this is independent of whether anyone was affected or harmed or how severely.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the event actually happened, or just had the potential to. Note that this is independent of whether anyone was affected or harmed or how severely.

name: $category
desc: Returns: The overall type of event, intended for search and filtering purposes.

name: $addcategory
desc: The overall type of event, intended for search and filtering purposes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The overall type of event, intended for search and filtering purposes.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Specific event that occurred or that was averted, such as patient fall, wrong organ removed, or wrong blood transfused.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specific event that occurred or that was averted, such as patient fall, wrong organ removed, or wrong blood transfused.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: This subject or group impacted by the event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: This subject or group impacted by the event.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The Encounter during which AdverseEvent was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Encounter during which AdverseEvent was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

name: $detected
desc: Returns: Estimated or actual date the AdverseEvent began, in the opinion of the reporter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Estimated or actual date the AdverseEvent began, in the opinion of the reporter.

name: $recordedDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the existence of the AdverseEvent was first recorded.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the existence of the AdverseEvent was first recorded.

name: $resultingCondition
desc: Returns: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

name: $addresultingCondition
desc: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

name: $location
desc: Returns: The information about where the adverse event occurred.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The information about where the adverse event occurred.

name: $seriousness
desc: Returns: Assessment whether this event, or averted event, was of clinical importance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Assessment whether this event, or averted event, was of clinical importance.

name: $outcome
desc: Returns: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event, such as resolved, recovering, ongoing, resolved-with-sequelae, or fatal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event, such as resolved, recovering, ongoing, resolved-with-sequelae, or fatal.

name: $recorder
desc: Returns: Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner.

name: $participant
desc: Returns: Indicates who or what participated in the adverse event and how they were involved.

name: $addparticipant
desc: Indicates who or what participated in the adverse event and how they were involved.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who or what participated in the adverse event and how they were involved.

name: $suspectEntity
desc: Returns: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

name: $addsuspectEntity
desc: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

name: $contributingFactor
desc: Returns: The contributing factors suspected to have increased the probability or severity of the adverse event.

name: $addcontributingFactor
desc: The contributing factors suspected to have increased the probability or severity of the adverse event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The contributing factors suspected to have increased the probability or severity of the adverse event.

name: $preventiveAction
desc: Returns: Preventive actions that contributed to avoiding the adverse event.

name: $addpreventiveAction
desc: Preventive actions that contributed to avoiding the adverse event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Preventive actions that contributed to avoiding the adverse event.

name: $mitigatingAction
desc: Returns: The ameliorating action taken after the adverse event occured in order to reduce the extent of harm.

name: $addmitigatingAction
desc: The ameliorating action taken after the adverse event occured in order to reduce the extent of harm.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The ameliorating action taken after the adverse event occured in order to reduce the extent of harm.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Supporting information relevant to the event.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Supporting information relevant to the event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Supporting information relevant to the event.

name: $study
desc: Returns: The research study that the subject is enrolled in.

name: $addstudy
desc: The research study that the subject is enrolled in.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The research study that the subject is enrolled in.
